Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Thinknx skill for Amazon Alexa permits to transform all devices connected to Thinknx system into voice controllable devices. 
In this way you will be able to simply control your KNX, z-wave or any other popular device asking to Thinknx skill for Amazon Alexa its activation.
In order to enable the skill you first need to create an account on Thinknx Portal at the following link (https://data.thinknx.eu/portal). After that you need to bind your Thinknx server with the account you just created (please follow the steps here: http://www.thinknx.com/wiki/doku.php?id=portal&s[]=portal).
When you will have your valid account on Thinknx Portal, you can enable the Thinknx skill for Amazon Alexa, and, following the prompted steps, you will be able to link it with your Thinknx server. After a valid connection, all the devices in your Thinknx Server will be available and controllable from Thinknx skill for Amazon Alexa.
